General.Name: Via S.A.
General.Description: Via S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of electronics, home appliances, and furniture in Brazil. It also offers financial services and solutions, such as buy now pay later, and credit card services; and logistics solutions and services comprising fulfillment and full commerce services. In addition, the company provides real estate properties administration, rent, lease, and intermediation services. It serves consumers through brick and-mortar stores and e-commerce platforms under the Casas Bahia, Ponto, Bartira, Extra.com, banQi, Rede Celer, ASAPLog, and CNT brands; and distribution centers and warehouses. The company was formerly known as Globex Utilidades SA and changed its name to Via S.A. in February 2012. Via S.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Eldorado Business Tower, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 05425-070
